ValidationRule.description: Forces Event Plus to be selected as Audio Type when Direct and InterCall are selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "InterCall"), ISPICKVAL( RT_Event_Type__c , "Operator Assisted Direct"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Event Plus")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c, "Event Plus with Passcode")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: InterCall Direct events can only be marked as Event Plus. Please select Event Plus as the Audio Type and save the record again.
